input.sentences: st. [male] 's day in my town can be very crazy ! we have a festival to celebrate .
we like to dress in green and drink lots of beer with our friends .
there 's usually a parade with some guys in kilts that play irish music .
i meet lots of pretty girls ! that 's always a plus .
then we visit the booths to play games and win prizes !
output.sentences: Its St Patrick's day and every one is out and about
My friends and I have joined in the celebration, and what a better excuse to have a nice cold beer
The peraid consist of a musical band and men on barkpipes
every one is happy during the celebration
It is a day for family and friends to enjoy which we all did. looking foward to next year celebration
